DOC.brief_summary: The purpose open-label extension study evaluate long-term efficacy safety FG-4592 maintain hemoglobin dialysis non-dialysis CKD patient complete Treatment Period FG-4592 FibroGen-sponsored anemia study .
DOC.brief_title: Open Label Extension Study Long-term Efficacy Safety FG-4592 Dialysis Non-dialysis Chronic Kidney Disease Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , long-term maintenance study FG-4592 anemia therapy dialysis non-dialysis Chronic Kidney Disease patient complete Treatment Period FG-4592 FibroGen-sponsored anemia Study . Subjects assign FG-4592 previous study continue receive FG-4592 dose dose frequency , unless dose adjustment require . An optional treatment group may allow subject assign placebo previous study start active FG-4592 study treatment .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Minimum age 18 year 2 . Completed Treatment Period ongoing FG4592 FibroGensponsored anemia study U.S. Exclusion Criteria 1 . Subjects assign epoetin alfa previous ongoing FG4592 anemia study 2 . Pregnant breastfeeding female 3 . Females childbearing potential , unless use contraception detail protocol ; male subject sexual partner childbearing potential birth control unless male subject agree use contraception 4 . Subjects receive FG4592 previous study demonstrate adequate hemoglobin response per investigator 's clinical judgment 5 . Any medical condition opinion investigator may pose safety risk subject study , may interfere study participation
